scripts.build-debug: curl http://localhost:8081/index.android.bundle?platform=android -o android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && cd android && gradlew clean && gradlew assembleDebug && gdrive upload --name minahallplatser-debug-${npm_package_version}.apk app/build/outputs/apk/app-debug.apk
scripts.build-release: npm run clean && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && gdrive upload --name minahallplatser-release-${npm_package_version}.apk app/build/outputs/apk/app-release.apk
